original_text: But someone may come who is stronger than he is. That man will attack him and beat him. The strong man believed his weapons would keep him safe. But the stronger man will take his weapons away. He will take the strong man's things and give them to other people.
korean_text: 더 강한 자가 와서 그를 굴복시킬 때에는 그가 믿던 무장을 빼앗고 그의 재물을 나누느니라

sentences.original_text: who is stronger than he is
his weapons would keep him safe
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 무기가 그를 안전하게 지켜줄 것이라고

sentences.original_text: But the stronger man will take his weapons away
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 더 강한 사람은 그의 무기를 빼앗을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will take the strong man's things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 강한 사람의 것들을 가져갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and give them to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 다른 사람들에게 줄 것입니다
